snippet: Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta is to disclose the strategy guiding hundreds of billions of dollars in Pentagon budget cuts during an unusual news conference on Thursday.
abstract: Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta concludes that the Army has to shrink even below current targets, dropping to 490,000 soldiers over the next decade; does not recommend that US cut any of its 11 aircraft carriers; will disclose the strategy guiding hundreds of billions of dollars in Pentagon budget cuts during an unusual Defense Department news conference.

byline.original: By THOM SHANKER and ELISABETH BUMILLER

lead_paragraph: Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta is to disclose the strategy guiding hundreds of billions of dollars in Pentagon budget cuts during an unusual news conference on Thursday.

headline.main: In New Strategy, Panetta Plans Even Smaller Army
